descMeta.title: "Old Abe," the live Wisconsin War Eagle
descMeta.description: image of the eagle carried by the 8th Wisconsin Regiment in the Civil War, sold with the "History of 'Old Abe,' the live war eagle of the Eighth Regiment Wisconsin Voluteers" by Joseph O. Barret; signature of Harrison Ludington, Governor of Wisconsin, 1876
